promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic lynx electric-type pokemon wearing a dark crystal headband. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltaguar, a a dynamic basic lynx electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Crush and Burn. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "electric" or "Voltaguar". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, lynx-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This urban predator, Voltaguar, uses Crush and Burn to generate sparks from its fur. By day, it lingers unseen in cities, blending in with electric lines.
